title: RoboClock Maze
summary: Roboclock Maze is a full-featured game developed specifically for watches.
developerAddress: Moscow, 107113, Sokolnicheskaya area, 4, building 1-2, room XX-2
description: RoboClock Maze - remember the path, find all the lights and fix RoboClocks.Four Roboclocks have broken down. Each one has 36 burned out lights. Your help is needed. You will have to repair them in the dark, by memory, with the help of a little robot.The Roboclock Maze - the better you remember, the less tired your legs will be!Instructions for fixing the Roboclocks:● Look at the scheme and remember where the lights and red output wire are.● Pass by all the cells with the mini robot, where LEDs are indicated. ● Leave the maze by embarking on the cell with the disconnected red wire. ● To spend less gaming moves, try to find all the lights.● If you run out of moves - walk around. For every 25 steps you get one game turn.● To receive moves during the game, touch the moves counter and touch “Convert” button. ● Collect 36 lights.RoboSlock Maze - Puzzle for smart waches.Tested devices: ASUS ZenWatch, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Motorola Moto 360.Train your memory.
descriptionHTML:
RoboClock Maze - remember the path, find all the lights and fix RoboClocks.

Four Roboclocks have broken down. Each one has 36 burned out lights. Your help is needed. You will have to repair them in the dark, by memory, with the help of a little robot.

The Roboclock Maze - the better you remember, the less tired your legs will be!

Instructions for fixing the Roboclocks:
● Look at the scheme and remember where the lights and red output wire are.
● Pass by all the cells with the mini robot, where LEDs are indicated.
● Leave the maze by embarking on the cell with the disconnected red wire.
● To spend less gaming moves, try to find all the lights.
● If you run out of moves - walk around. For every 25 steps you get one game turn.
● To receive moves during the game, touch the moves counter and touch “Convert” button.
● Collect 36 lights.

RoboSlock Maze - Puzzle for smart waches.

Tested devices: ASUS ZenWatch, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Motorola Moto 360.

Train your memory.
comments: Sony Smartwatch 3 (SWR50) High quality Android Wear game. Fun little puzzle game that seems easy but and it's addicting
Keeps freezing and having to start over from the beginning. Do not recommend for free much less paying for it.
Really well designed and a lot of fun!
